attributes.action: Stand down along side all current parliamentary representitives due to loss of confidence from the citizens of England and Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Time for change has come, the citizens of Britain have lost all faith in the ability of the current elected parliamentary system to lead and run our country. 

We call for an independent general election to be called, with indivduals running without party bias. 

Once parliamentary representitives are elected a further election is conducted to vote for Cabinet Minsters and a new Prime Minster, ensuring the best person for the job is elected rather than position or standing with a specfic party organisation structure.

We believe that while an antiquated colour code political system exists the ability for the general public to elect the best representatives to run its country is impossible, that must change..

When did it become right for parliament not to act in the interests of all its citizens.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
